DOC.brief_title: Selinexor ( KPT-330 ) Patients With Metastatic Castration-Resistant Prostate Cancer Prior Therapy With Abiraterone and/or Enzalutamide
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 18 year . Histologically confirm adenocarcinoma prostate . Patients must castrate level testosterone ( < 50 ng/dL ) GnRH analogues prior orchiectomy . GnRH analogues must continue study . Progressive disease demonstrate rise PSA ( least two determination ) prior study entry , and/or radiographic evidence tumor progression soft tissue accord modify RECIST criterion identification new lesion bone scan ( i.e. , ≥ 2 new lesion ) .
